description:
This module delves into the key talent assessment activities & strategic managerial considerations that are essential for successful talent selection. The topics to explore and discuss include:

- Strategic Approach to Talent Selection
- Institutional Constraints & Social Responsibilities in Talent Selection
- Selecting Talent by Career Stages
- Application Form: What Can You Get from It?
- Assessing Personality Traits
- Assessing Personal & Work Values
- Assessing Decision Making Capabilities
- Selection Interview: More Than Just a Talk Shop
- New Technologies for Talent Selection
- Evaluating the Effectiveness of Talent Selection
title: Talent Assessment & Selection
